row.process:
:SET &result# = "" :SET &diffCount# = "" :SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PRV.VARA.TEMP.GET_DISK_SPACE_RESULT.PP_COMPARE_ENTRY.&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#" :SET &variablePath# = ""
:IF &UC4RB_FILE_OUTPUT# <> "NONE" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE :ENDIF
:SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#)
: SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#,"Diff-Count: ") : IF &pos# > 0 : SET &pos# = &pos# + 12 : SET &line# = MID(&line#,&pos#) : SET &diffCount# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_FILE_OUTPUT# <> "NONE" : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#, "File: ") : IF &pos# > 0 : SET &pos# = &pos# + 6 : SET &line# = MID(&line#,&pos#) : SET &result# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &commaPos# = STR_FIND(&result#, ",") : IF &commaPos# > 0 : SET &key# = STR_CUT(&result#,1, &commaPos#) : SET &value# = STR_CUT(&result#, &commaPos#) : ELSE : SET &key# = &result# : set &value# = "" : ENDIF : PUT_VAR &variableName#, "&key#", "&UC4RB_FILE_OUTPUT#", "&value#" : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS
:PSET &UC4RB_OUT_DIF_COUNT# = &diffCount# :IF &UC4RB_FILE_OUTPUT# <> "NONE" : PSET &UC4RB_OUT_DIF_DETAIL# = "&variableName#" :ENDIF
:IF &UC4RB_FILE_FAIL# <> "NEITHER" : IF &UC4RB_FILE_FAIL# = "DIFFERENT" : IF &UC4RB_OUT_DIF_COUNT# > 0 : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="Differences found" : PRINT "Differences found and Fail on Different is enabled" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1 : ENDIF : ENDIF : IF &UC4RB_FILE_FAIL# = "SAME" : IF &UC4RB_OUT_DIF_COUNT# = 0 : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="No differences found" : PRINT "No differences found and Fail on Same is enabled" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=1 : ENDIF : ENDIF :ENDIF
